value.title: How to add ANNOTATIONS to a chart in Power BI to provide an explanation or more context!
value.excerpt: Annotations on charts are helpful for showing when key events occurred, especially when they have a noticeable impact on the data  or to give insights on the numbers in text form to help the reader understand the chart.  In todays video I will show you can you can add annotations to charts automatically

value.title: Insert blank rows at each category in Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to have a blank row after each category or subcategory, so you can visualize your data in a table?   In this video I will show you how to add a blank row for each group using power query in one step!  Enjoy!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Normalizing data: The what, why and how
value.excerpt: Normalizing data in Power BI: The what, why and how  When analyzing data by population, plotting the row data against the geographical location will fail to reveal important patterns when comparing countries with big differences in population and this is when it is useful to normalize the data.
